operations.command:
for dir in /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/*/; do
  name=$(basename "$dir")
  tasks="$dir/tasks.md"
  spec="$dir/spec.md"
  
  if [[ -f "$tasks" ]]; then
    total=$(grep -c "^\s*- \[" "$tasks" 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
    done=$(grep -c "^\s*- \[x\]" "$tasks" 2>/dev/null || echo 0)
    pending=$((total - done))
    echo "$name: $done/$total done ($pending pending)"
  elif [[ -f "$spec" ]]; then
    echo "$name: spec exists, NO tasks.md"
  else
    echo "$name: empty/incomplete"
  fi
done

for dir in /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/*/; do
  name=$(basename "$dir")
  tasks="$dir/tasks.md"
  spec="$dir/spec.md"
  
  if [[ -f "$tasks" ]]; then
    total=$(grep -cE '^\s*- \[' "$tasks" || true)
    done=$(grep -cE '^\s*- \[x\]' "$tasks" || true)
    echo "$name: tasks=$total, done=$done"
  elif [[ -f "$spec" ]]; then
    echo "$name: spec only (no tasks.md)"
  else
    echo "$name: incomplete"
  fi
done

for dir in /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/008-time-evolving-heatmap /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/009-eth-symbol /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/010-alert-system /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/011-realtime-streaming /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/012-exchange-aggregation /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/013-screenshot-validation /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/014-validation-pipeline /media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/015-adaptive-signals; do
  name=$(basename "$dir")
  tasks="$dir/tasks.md"
  if [[ -f "$tasks" ]]; then
    echo "=== $name ==="
    head -50 "$tasks"
    echo ""
    echo "---"
  fi
done
operations.description: Read tasks.md headers for each spec

operations.command:
for spec in 008-time-evolving-heatmap 009-eth-symbol 010-alert-system 011-realtime-streaming 012-exchange-aggregation 013-screenshot-validation 014-validation-pipeline 015-adaptive-signals; do
  file="/media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/$spec/tasks.md"
  if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then
    total=$(grep -cE '^\s*-\s*\[' "$file" || echo 0)
    done=$(grep -ciE '^\s*-\s*\[x\]' "$file" || echo 0)
    pending=$((total - done))
    echo "$spec: $done/$total completati ($pending pendenti)"
  fi
done

echo "=== Status Specs ==="
for spec in 008-time-evolving-heatmap 009-eth-symbol 010-alert-system 011-realtime-streaming 012-exchange-aggregation 013-screenshot-validation 014-validation-pipeline 015-adaptive-signals; do
  file="/media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/$spec/tasks.md"
  if [[ -f "$file" ]]; then
    total=$(grep -cE '^\s*-\s*\[' "$file" 2>/dev/null)
    done=$(grep -ciE '^\s*-\s*\[x\]' "$file" 2>/dev/null)
    echo "$spec: done=$done total=$total"
  fi
done 2>&1 | grep -v "syntax error"

echo "=== Unchecked lines ===" && for spec in 008-time-evolving-heatmap 010-alert-system 013-screenshot-validation; do

  grep -nE '^\s*-\s*\[' "/media/sam/1TB/LiquidationHeatmap/specs/$spec/tasks.md" | grep -iv '\[x\]'
done
